title: Crash in current develop - show galery error
body:

It looks like there is crash in **bumptech - glide library** while browsing photo attachments

Add two photo attachments. 
save note
Open saved note

comments:
The problem probably caused by not compatible versions of Glide. 
in simple gallery  **com.github.federicoiosue:simplegallery:3.0.1**  is used 
`implementation 'com.github.bumptech.glide:glide:4.8.0'`
and in omninotes 
`implementation 'com.github.bumptech.glide:glide:4.10.0'`

Could be this problem solved only by updating the simplegallery?
